name: Fushoku: >help (v0.1)
description:
Fushoku: >help is my little passion project. I have been playing video games for years and I have always dreamed o creating my own. Fushoku is intended to be a full  release JRPG Horror game sometime in the future, but for now it is just in its testing phase so that I can get second opinions on the content within it.

(As of Update v0.1) You are simply a girl named Okashi in her apartment. Currently the game does not sport any plot or levels. It is simply a home with some gimmicks to play with until the next update.

If you would like to support me in my creation of Fushoku: >help, a donation is linked at the download page. Donating is never a requirement, but always appreciated. The game in its current state is 100% free.

Credits to the game are on the official Discord server. https://discord.gg/fKU9A6k
